amendment.description: Amendment provides $5 million for the Geothermal Technology Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase Energy Efficiency Programs by $5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
